text:
Josef Pešice (12 February 1950 – 18 December 2017) was a Czech football player and manager. He was born in Prague.
Pešice played for both famous Prague clubs, Sparta Prague and Slavia Prague. He won the Czechoslovak First League with this team in the 78 season. As a manager, Pešice led several Czech clubs before focusing on Czech Republic youth national teams. He was named the temporary head coach of the Czech Republic in September 2013.
Pešice died on 18 December 2017 in Prague at the age of 67.
